issue.title: [Python] Parquet+HDFS test failure due to writing pandas index
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1056](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1056). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Encountered while testing 0.4.0 rc1, but not a blocker. The test `pyarrow.tests.test_hdfs.TestLibHdfs testMethod=test_hdfs_read_multiple_parquet_files` needs to be fixed now that DataFrame indexes are written to Parquet files by default. We should figure out how to test the HDFS integration in some CI
